list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an injury appearing as an area of discolored skin on the body, caused by a blow or impact rupturing underlying blood vessels.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his body was a mass of bruises after he had been attacked
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cơ thể anh ta là một khối bầm tím sau khi anh ta bị tấn công

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: inflict a bruise or bruises on (a part of the body).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I fell and bruised my knee
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi ngã và bầm ẫm đầu gối của tôi
